title: Banker

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Confused players will unknowingly target themselves instead of their original target. You receive any messages they got from performing their action.
- Confusion fails if the confused player visits the Banker.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4907
*I'll put that in your account.*
